title: CoBounty  -  Open Bounty Market for Civic Tasks
summary: A transparent, non-extractive bounty board for tasks across standards, docs, data cleanup, and outreach, with attested completion and dispute flows.
rationale: Incentives accelerate boring but essential work; we need non-captured economics and quality guarantees.
impact: Higher throughput on maintenance tasks, clearer prioritization signals, and improved contributor retention.
